document_data.name: Helve Moonstar
document_data.mainbody: '''Helve Moonstar''' was the patriarch of House [[Moonstar (family)|Moonstar]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Helve was rebellious in his past, but matured over time. Helve secretly feared that his heir, [[Rober Moonstar]], didn't have the qualities needed to lead the house, so he tested all his nieces and nephews hoping to find a better candidate.
document_data.History: Helve was an officer in the [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard's]] cavalry until an accident ended his career. To the delight of his father, he devoted himself to his family's businesses. The business prospered thanks to his wife's guidance.
